snippet.title: ICEBOUND - GAMEPLAY TRAILER
snippet.description:
Take a ride you will never forget in ICEBOUND, a new action-packed simulator!

LINK: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2868080/ICEBOUND/

Go on a gripping adventure as Henry, a brave member of a rescue expedition in unforgiving northern Quebec. Suddenly separated from your team in the midst of a weather crisis, hostile wildlife, and even an aggressive military, it's up to you to fight for survival against all odds.

Key Features:
🧭 Experience navigating through demanding conditions in a heavy-duty snow vehicle.
🪖 Outmaneuver a hostile military faction with stealth, deception and craftiness.
🥫 Manage resources and maintain your vehicle to endure the harsh conditions.
🌲 Adapt to ever-changing landscapes and weather that will test your skills and will.
⌛ Experience a compelling narrative as you fight for survival against all odds.


#upcominggame #steamgame #pcgames #iceboundgame #gametrailers #simulator
